attributes.visState: {"aggs": [], "type": "metrics", "title": "Alerts Overview [Filebeat Azure]", "params": {"type": "timeseries", "interval": "", "isModelInvalid": false, "axis_position": "left", "index_pattern": "filebeat-*", "series": [{"id": "61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "stacked": "none", "hide_in_legend": 0, "axis_position": "right", "point_size": 1, "filter": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Activated\"", "language": "kuery"}, "split_mode": "filter", "line_width": 1, "formatter": "number", "fill": 0.5, "chart_type": "line", "separate_axis": 0, "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417"}], "color": "rgba(252,220,0,1)"}, {"id": "5a52f170-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a", "stacked": "none", "hide_in_legend": 0, "axis_position": "right", "point_size": 1, "filter": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Resolved\" or azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Succeeded\"", "language": "kuery"}, "split_mode": "filter", "line_width": 1, "formatter": "number", "fill": 0.5, "chart_type": "line", "separate_axis": 0, "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "5a52f171-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a"}], "color": "#68BC00"}], "filter": {"query": "event.dataset :\"azure.activitylogs\" and azure.activitylogs.event_category : \"Alert\"", "language": "kuery"}, "default_timefield": "@timestamp", "axis_scale": "normal", "time_field": "", "show_grid": 1, "default_index_pattern": "metricbeat-*", "show_legend": 0, "axis_formatter": "number", "id": "61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417"}}
